channel.title: Godsword Stance V1 & V2
channel.description:
I took a no animation frame from the animation viewer and tried to make a godsword stance out of it. This is only a V1 so say all you want about it. I know the arms and the legs around the crotch area are a little jacked up looking. I also have NO idea how to add it =/ as an emote yay me.
Front View: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV12.jpg[/img]
Back View: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV13.jpg[/img]
Side View: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV1.jpg[/img]
Actual Stance: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/godsword_stats.png[/img]
Front of V2: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV2.jpg[/img]
Back of V2: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV23.jpg[/img]
Side of V3: [IMG]http://i470.photobucket.com/albums/rr64/Scullyscape/GowdswordStanceV22.jpg[/img] If anyone wants the download link to this to make the arms not look like crap here it is. http://uppit.com/6WLFAI

Which is for editing frames which are already there…
Custom animations such as godsword stances have yet to have been added to a 317 client.

item.title: Godsword Stance V1 & V2
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:22, topic:262832”]And plus, I wouldn’t bother with this, because you cannot put these emotes into the 317 client.
MrP already released the method of editing emotes from there frames on r-s, he had an emote where it looked like the character was kicking itself in the head, which is just about it.

He released the method of doing it, but has it gone anywhere? Not yet.[/quote]

You obviously didn’t look in the parent board, the lesser demon 474 animation file is in 317 format.
What you want me to do everything?

I PK Pigeons:

So why should I waste my time on something that’s not efficient.

Ditto.

SIGH

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Stance V1 & V2
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“fromdhood101, post:20, topic:262832”][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=347084.msg2690163#msg2690163 date=1235921426]

Hey, I is just being funny coz everyone wants godsword emotes, don’t take things personally.

Bit like the datmaker, it was intended for creating custom models that you’d never see in runescape, not for 50+ dragon plates. (the horror)

I can see you put alot of effort into making it and i’m sorry if I upset you.
It’s very nice

You released it to rsps communities, what would you think they would do.
Its like giving crack to a crack addict, what would you expect them to do?
[/quote]

Yup and lets see your dumb ass actually make something out of this? Don’t bitch about crack and crack addicts, because this is like giving a needle with no crack - you can’t do shit with it if you’re a noob.[/quote]

Sorry but, Crack is a smokeable form of cocaine.
So when you try and bitch back, at least have some sort of knowledge of what you’re going on about

And plus, I wouldn’t bother with this, because you cannot put these emotes into the 317 client.
MrP already released the method of editing emotes from there frames on r-s, he had an emote where it looked like the character was kicking itself in the head, which is just about it.

He released the method of doing it, but has it gone anywhere? Not yet.
So why should I waste my time on something that’s not efficient.

When you know what you’re talking about, call me a dumb ass then.

Read full topic
